section.1: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that:The Prophet said: "If anyone of wakes up and sees some wetness, but he does not think that he had an erotic dream, let him have a bath. But if he thinks that he had an erotic dream but he does not see any wetness, then he does not have to take a bath
